ActiveHint: Please reboot to activate the license.
AddToCaseDialog: Users can save specific search results in the system, along with a name and description, for future viewing or reference. This facilitates easy tracking and access to content of interest, simplifying information management.
AlbumFilterDialog: Users have the option to select whether they want to view results that have been specifically categorized within the album or explore uncategorized results, offering flexibility in their browsing experience.
BookmarkDialog: Users can add specified video clips to the bookmark feature within the Nx system. This allows users to easily access these video clips in the future, enhancing their viewing experience for added convenience.
CameraFilterDialog: Users have the option to select the specific scene data they wish to access, providing a personalized viewing experience tailored to their preferences.
CancelHint: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?
CaseHint: please remember to download case manually because video archive could be expired.
DeletCaseDialog: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to permanently delete this case? Relevant data cannot be recovered, so please consider carefully to avoid losing important information.
DeleteUserDialog: Users can delete their accounts through this feature. Please confirm your action, as the account cannot be recovered after deletion.
DeletTaskDialog: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to permanently delete this task? The related data cannot be recovered, so please consider carefully to avoid the loss of important information.
EditAlbumDialog: Users can easily edit the name and description of albums to facilitate business-oriented management and organization of visual content. This enhances album efficiency and recognition.
EditUserDialog: Users can effortlessly edit their personal information through this feature, including their name and email, to ensure the accuracy of their details.
MobileUploadStep1: Step1: Select a photo in your phone
MoveToAlbumDialog: Users can effortlessly move their current photos to other albums, enabling more efficient organization and management of their image content. This offers greater flexibility in resource allocation.
NewUserDialog: Users can create a new account or update their personal information in the system through this feature. Please provide your name, password, and email. This will grant you access to our features.
PleaseSelectBeforePresent: Time-travel to future moments feature coming soon!
ResetPasswordDialog: Please use a valid license key to reset the administrator password. If you are a regular user, kindly contact the administrator for assistance in changing your password.
RestartDialog: Pressing "Confirm" will initiate a system reboot. Kindly await for a brief period, then refresh the page to proceed with the login.
SaveToAlbumDialog: Users can add specific photos to an album, and the photos within the album are used for future facial recognition. When the system detects a face, it compares it to the photos in the album.
SaveToPdfDialog: Users can select multiple specific video clips and export them as a PDF document with a customized PDF filename. This allows you to conveniently combine several video clips into a single PDF file, tailored to your preferences.
SelectTargetPrompt: Please select one face from the left face wall. Then, select one of the similar faces listed in this panel to start the investigation.
Subject: Subject
Title: Title
UploadDialog: Users can integrate images into the system by uploading them to the album, making them readily available for use in other functions.
VideoArchiveDialog: Users can customize a name, select multiple specified video clips, and save them as a downloadable web page. This allows you to effortlessly capture and share multiple video clips, catering to your needs.
ReloginHint: Do you need to log in to airaTrack again?
